name: The Online House Tour
description:
Made for the '4th Wall Broken Jam 2023' Game Jam hosted by IntStories on Itch. Go view it here!

Your friend moved into a new house about two months ago. And he never showed it to you! You video-call him and he answers. But the most unusual thing happens...

This is a heavily story-based game, not much action will happen but it's a fun experience with some different twists.
